title: Enhancing e-Learning Practical Competencies: Ideology and Political Education Design in Information Security Curricula

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information security concepts and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ideological elements in information security curricula and incorporate them into instructional design
Learners can develop PBL scenarios integrating political education objectives by applying the backward design model
Learners can design curriculum effectiveness evaluation tools according to summative assessment criteria
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
